question: How many customers are from USA?
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers WHERE Country = 'USA'

question: Show all genres
sql: SELECT * FROM genres ORDER BY Name

question: List all artists
sql: SELECT * FROM artists ORDER BY Name

question: Get all albums
sql: SELECT * FROM albums ORDER BY Title

question: Show all employees
sql: SELECT FirstName, LastName, Title FROM employees ORDER BY LastName

question: List all playlists
sql: SELECT * FROM playlists ORDER BY Name

question: Show all media types
sql: SELECT * FROM media_types ORDER BY Name

question: Show expensive tracks
sql: SELECT * FROM tracks WHERE UnitPrice > 0.99 ORDER BY UnitPrice DESC

question: Show all Rock tracks
sql: SELECT t.* FROM tracks t JOIN genres g ON t.GenreId = g.GenreId WHERE g.Name = 'Rock'
